Package Ex2_EranReuvenPkg

Class Survey

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ex2_EranReuvenPkg.JsonResponse
      • Ex2_EranReuvenPkg.Survey
  • public class Survey
extends JsonResponse
    Class: Survey, extends of JsonResponse Description: This class is to manage survey object. It will get filename from the construct call (in our case, from ServletSurvey) and will run over the file and creats Map that the first key is the title (question) and all other keys is the answers. It also extends of JsonResponse to response the map as Json object just like 'Results' class. Members: BufferedReader m_reader - to open the file to read String m_line - will hold each line we call in iterate. int SurveySize - will hold the survey size

    • Method Detail

      • surveyMapLoader

        public void surveyMapLoader​(java.lang.String filename)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Function: surveyMapLoader
        Parameters:
        filename - - filename path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - throws when open the file/read from the file has been failed. Description: This function gets from the called section the filepath and open the file to read. then, we read the first line because we know it the question, and after that in the loop, we read all the other lines (the answers)
